The beauty is in the taste and the design. Each piece includes a generous bar of creamy caramel candy perched atop a convenient disposable stick. Simply peel the bright yellow wrapper and enjoy golden caramel confection to your heart's content without the gooey mess!Anytime is a great time to buy Sugar Daddy candy! Give them away during holidays, hide them in party favors or keep them around the pantry for days when you're craving something smooth and sweet. Since 1925, Sugar Daddies have been the go-to candy for caramel lovers. New sizes have been introduced over the years, but none compare to the large Sugar Daddy caramel pop. Take your mouth on a saccharine vacation with a box of nostalgic Sugar Daddy candies!

title: Charms Blow Pops Mini 2oz - 24ct
desc: Awwww! These little cuties are some of the most delicious miniatures of a traditional candy that we've found! We're talking about our amazing Charms Blow Pops Minis and think you'll find them to be adorable too once you take a look and a bite.Packed with the same hard candy flavors, delicious bubblegum chew, but without the stick and in a teeny, tiny hard candy form, these munchkins are a delicious treat to enjoy when you have a small sweet tooth you'd like to satisfy. Pop one into your mouth and enjoy as the fruity flavors melt away and leave you with a chewy morsel of pink bubblegum, or chew them up from the start! Whatever you do, we're sure you'll love these delicious candies.

title: Sugar Babies - 24ct
desc: Classic Sugar Babies are more than just theater candy, they make perfect additions to holidays and birthdays. Sugar Babies are delectable little bean shaped candies with rich caramel bits inside. They can be added to edible landscapes as locks and stones, used as buttons on snowman cookies and even act as creepy zombie bits on Halloween cupcakes. Sugar Babies have endless uses but, of course, they can be used for theater themed parties and family movie nights. The real prize comes when you eat a flavorful Sugar Baby, sweet sugary candy followed by an even sweeter caramel center will send your senses into overdrive. Grab a pack to go, snack when in traffic, or working on a difficult project for instant stress relief. For businesses Sugar Babies come in a classic display box making them perfect for break room fundraisers. Sugar Babies come 24 separate packs per classic display box.

title: Mean Green Blow Pops - 48ct
desc: Charms Blow Pops are known for essentially being two treats in one. You get a hard, sweet, fruit-flavored candy shell and a bubble gum center. Well, Mean Green Blow Pops have the yummy gum and the long lasting candy shell, but there is nothing sweet about them.These bad boys are just about as sour as you get, but totally delicious. The sour lime shell is definitely pucker-inducing. It will bring tears to your eyes as you lick your way to the chewy center.Mean Green Blow Pops are just about the best Halloween candy you will find. The blow pop itself is clear, but the green center glows. These are perfect for trick-or-treaters. They are also fun for theme parties, and since they are individually wrapped they are perfect to share.Mean Green Blow Pops are made in America and prepared in a facility that is gluten, peanut, and tree nut-free. Plus, each pop has only 60 calories and no fat, so snack away!

You can even save money and get more treats to give out during the holidays.Hand out pieces as this year's Halloween candy or add to Easter baskets in the spring. Bulk candy is a smart choice for schools, businesses and community events. Use to fill candy dishes for customers or give out as a sweet thank you!

title: Ghirardelli Premium Chocolate Squares - 120ct Box
desc: Either you have a lot of apologizing to do, or you're a bonafide chocolate lover looking for your next scrumptious fix! We hope it's the latter and that you'll enjoy stocking up on these premium chocolate squares. Forged by the finest chocolatiers at Ghirardelli, these gourmet morsels are offered in six of the most popular flavors that will provide hours upon hours of mind-blowing mouthfuls. Ghirardelli began their chocolate exploration in California over over 160 years ago during the gold rush. They have proven to strike gold of their own in the chocolate world and with a long legacy as a beloved American classic.

title: Ghirardelli Premium Chocolate Bars - 12ct
desc: With 60% cacao, every Ghirardelli Premium Chocolate Bar is a gourmet mix of bittersweet complexity, melty decadence and of course, yumminess. If your idea of a perfect snack involves chocolate, chocolate and more chocolate, these Ghirardelli Premium Chocolate Bars are for you!Stock yourself up for a gourmet fondue party, gift basket making extravaganza, party with friends, or to satisfy a voracious sweet tooth with an order of these Ghirardelli Premium Chocolate Bars. Since they're divided into sections, you may break a piece or two off to enjoy in between meals, melt a few squares into a cup of hot chocolate for added richness, or share with friends and family—if you're feeling generous that day! We know you'll love every possibility when it comes to savoring these Ghirardelli Premium Chocolate Bars.

title: Ghirardelli Peppermint Bark Chocolate Bars - 14ct
desc: Ghirardelli peppermint bark chocolate bars combine the sweet taste of peppermint with rich, creamy chocolate. This delicious blend showcases the quality and flavor that makes Ghirardelli the preferred chocolate brand for many candy lovers.The company's origins date back to 1847 when Italian-born Domenico Ghirardelli opened up his confectionary shop after studying with candy makers throughout his childhood. Today, Ghirardelli produces fine gourmet chocolates that come in a variety of flavors. Our peppermint bark bars offer a unique snacking experience with a touch of refreshing taste. This limited edition Ghirardelli creation includes a delectable layer of milk chocolate followed by a blanket of smooth white chocolate. The top is covered in peppermint candy cane pieces.Our bulk Ghirardelli peppermint bark chocolate bar pack gives you many individually wrapped servings that are wonderful for stocking stuffers and gift giving! Hand them out to coworkers or employees for Christmas or use them as part of a handmade custom gourmet gift basket.

title: Ghirardelli Intense Dark Chocolate Bars - 12ct
desc: When you are looking for a quality confection, you need to taste luxurious Ghirardelli Intense Dark chocolate bars! This delectable treat is sure to satisfy with the rich, smooth taste of delicious dark chocolate.The Ghirardelli name appeared in 1852 and currently ranks as the 3rd oldest chocolate maker in the United States! That's quite a lot of chocolate produced over the years. Our bulk Ghirardelli chocolate bars features a one-of-a-kind assortment that is a must-have for gourmet candy lovers. Each large bar is made of expertly crafted dark chocolate with a blend of other irresistible ingredients.Try Citrus Sunset with orange and almond crunch or Espresso Escape with ground espresso beans. Mint Bliss offers a refreshing mix of dark chocolate and mint while Evening Dream contains Madagascan vanilla. Reach for a Toffee Interlude with crisp toffee and caramelized almonds or enjoy classic Twilight Delight which is 72% dark chocolate.

title: Pop Rocks Chocolate Candy Packs - 24ct Box
desc: Pop Rocks has upped the ante with this limited edition creation. Each package contains the same sweet crystals you love covered in a layer of rich chocolate. Open a pack, pour into your mouth and enjoy chocolate flavor. It’s the clam before the tasty storm because as soon as that chocolate melts away, your taste buds will explode with this crackling treat. Share the tongue tingle with our bulk Pop Rocks pack!

title: Pop Rocks Grape Candy Packs - 24ct Box
desc: Grape Pop Rocks are just one more reason to try this irresistible confection! There’s lots of grape candy in the world, but none offer the same snacking experience as Pop Rocks. Open up the packet, pour this retro candy crystals on your tongue then wait for the excitement to begin. You get a burst of sweet grape flavor immediately followed by pops and crackles across your tongue.

title: Pop Rocks Blue Raspberry Candy Packs - 24ct Box
desc: Blue raspberry Pop Rocks offer yet another tasty take on this one-of-a-kind retro candy! Take an envelope and open it up to discover a collection of tiny crystal pieces. Place on the tongue and let the fun begin! You get the sweet taste of blue raspberry followed by the intense popping and crackling that makes this confection so memorable. Rediscover an old favorite with our bulk Pop Rocks blue raspberry candy!

title: Pop Rocks Green Apple Candy Packs - 24ct Box
desc: Pop Rocks green apple will take your taste buds on a stroll through an exploding orchard! Expand your flavor horizons with the grate taste of this unusual confection. Each package contains a generous quantity of tasty crystals. The party begins as soon as they hit your tongue! Each piece creates a tingly sensation with pops and crackles that make the snacking experience even better. Our bulk green apple Pop Rocks box is a smart choice for kids parties and events.

title: Pop Rocks Cherry Candy Packs - 24ct Box
desc: Pop Rocks cherry candy is an exciting treat that will take you back in time! This is the original flavor that made this confection so popular. Each box contains an assortment of individual packets. Tear one open and pour onto your tongue to discover the fizzy, tingly sensation that accompanies the famous pop and crackle of this one-of-a-kind confection. Our bulk cherry Pop Rocks pack makes a great filler for party favors and more!

title: Pop Rocks Cotton Candy Candy Packs - 24ct Box
desc: Pop Rocks is the candy that explodes in your mouth! Our collection includes one of the sweetest flavors you will ever taste: cotton candy! Each packet contains a generous helping of crystal pieces. Pour directly on your tongue to enjoy the great cotton candy taste along with the tingle and pop that makes this confection so popular. Our bulk Pop Rocks cotton candy pack is a must-have for parties!

title: Pop Rocks Sugar Free - 24ct
desc: Sugar free Pop Rocks are one of the coolest candies you will ever eat! Every single bite is like a rockin' party in your mouth. Pop Rocks were first introduced in 1975. Due to a short shelf life and lack of interest, the candy was pulled by the 1980s.This exciting confection wasn't done yet, though. They were reintroduced and quickly became the popular treat that is still sold throughout the country today! Unstoppable Pop Rocks come in flat pouches that contain a serving of small, crystal candy. When they reach your tongue, these little poppin' rocks start to dance and crackle!Pop Rocks literally pop as you eat them. You get the sweet flavor of juicy strawberry and the popping sensation that makes taste buds tingle. Our Sugar free Pop Rocks offer a tasty alternative that's easier to fit into your daily diet. Don't give up your favorite classic candy just because you want to live healthier. Instead reach for our bulk sugar free Pop Rocks!

title: Pop Rocks Bubble Gum - 24ct
desc: The countdown to detonation has begun! The moment you open these Pop Rocks Bubble Gum candy packets and lift them to your mouth, you'll have 3É2.. 1... seconds until they explode on your tongue!However, don't fret too much. Once you survive the blast of the bursting rocks, you'll be able to chew down on delicious bubble gum. We call that a delicious calm after the storm and think you will too once you get a taste. Make Halloween for trick-or-treaters even more exciting this year with an order of these classic Pop Rocks.Or make your little ones smile at home by trying these Pop Rocks Bubble Gum for the first time. The choice is yours. Just get ready for fire in the hole!

title: Pop Rocks Sour Xtreme Packs - 48ct
desc: The invention of Pop Rocks changed the candy world as we know it back in 1956. In 2002, Pop Rocks Sour Xtreme Packs came along and had people in tears. Literally! If you are a bit of a wimp, when it comes to sour candy these Pop Rocks Sour Xtreme Packs are not for you.The sour level borders between crazy and completely insane, and is only for the brave who believe candy just is not worth eating unless it's causing you to pucker!Puckering won't be a problem. Getting your face back to its pre-puckered state after eating the contents of one of these Pop Rocks Sour Xtreme Packs will be your biggest challenge. This bulk supply includes in 2 flavors: Sour Berry Blast and Savage Sour Apple.Kids having a slumber party? Give them these, and they'll be too busy puckering to talk through the movie! This makes them perfect for long car rides, too.

title: Pop Rocks Candy - 36ct
desc: 3, 2, 1, fire! These wild little rocks will detonate and blow up your taste buds with fruity deliciousness! Invented in 1956, these thrilling sweets were designed with air pockets of CO2 that when put in your mouth, create a tingling, popping sensation that will thrill every candy lover. Bring some of these to a Fourth of July party to set off an edible set of fireworks for your taste buds, add them to a candy buffet bar for people to take home and enjoy, or even add these to a present for an explosive and delicious surprise. With this box of Pop Rocks, you'll have enough to detonate candy deliciousness in the mouths of many.

title: Pop Rocks Dips - 18ct
desc: Pop Rocks Dips is a unique treat that's carbonated! If you love the fizzy feeling of soda pop, then you'll love the intense crackle produced by these sweet treats.Original Pop Rocks were introduced in 1975. They literally became a part of pop culture history! No other candy offers a literal explosion in your mouth. Pop Rocks would be the inspiration for other "popping" candies, though none could surpass the original's popularity!Our Pop Rocks Dips includes a colorful box that contains several individual pouches of this crystal-like candy. A lollipop is included and can be dipped in the pouch to make eating even more exciting! Our bulk Pop Rocks Dips give you large quantities that are convenient for birthday parties, holidays and more.Use them as stocking stuffers or hand them out during school activities. Children will love the popping sensation and sound that comes from every mouthful of Pop Rocks Dips!

title: Pop Rocks Fun Size - 500ct

Bring some of these to a Fourth of July party to set off an edible set of fireworks for your taste buds, add them to a candy buffet bar for people to take home and enjoy, or even add these to a present for an explosive and delicious surprise. With this Fun Size Case of Pop Rocks, you'll have enough to detonate candy deliciousness in the mouths of many.

title: Pop Rocks Pumpkin Patch - 36ct
desc: Pumpkin Patch Pop Rocks offer a classic flavor that's made for autumn and Halloween! This delicious fizzy candy dates back to a 1957 patent. Pop Rocks became publically available in 1975 but encountered problems because of its short shelf life.It wasn't until much later in the 2000s that Pop Rocks would really take off! Today, candy lovers adore the sweet flavor and unique popping, fizzing experience that comes in every pouch! title: Pink Whirly Pops - 24ct Displays
desc: With this selection of Pink Whirly Pops, you'll feel like you're at the carnival every time you take a look or a lick! In lovely cardboard display boxes, these pink swirl Whirly Pops stand at attention and are sure to get a lot of it if they're set out at a carnival themed party, on your counter during a get together or put inside a candy gift basket.With lovely pink and white swirls, you'll be taken back to your rides on the tilt-a-whirl and other dizzying attractions. With one lick, you'll hear the merry-go-round organs and with one bite you'll hear the shrieks of fair-goers taking the first plunge on a rollercoaster. If you'd like to have more fun every time you snack on a delicious candy, then order some Pink Whirly Pops now!

title: Blue Whirly Pops - 24ct Displays
desc: We almost feel bad for parents when stores put this display of Blue Whirly Pops on the counter. No child can resist the urge to beg and plead for one of these exciting yummy treats.Quite honestly, if you order a display of Blue Whirly Pops for home, you may find your kids become very eager to clean their room and do extra chores. These are perfect for classrooms as a special treat on exam day.A whirlwind of blue and white stripes swirl together to create a lolly almost too good to eat. We said "almost." With just one lick, the blue raspberry flavor will have you forgetting all about its charming exterior appearance. These confectionary masterpieces are 3 inches across, so they last a really long time.

title: Rainbow Whirly Pops 4" - 48ct
desc: Rainbow Whirly Pops 4  lollipops are a true classic! Think of all the movies you've seen with a happy little boy or girl licking a lollipop almost as big as their face. These sweet treats look like a rainbow vortex, and they taste like the best days of childhood. Get a 48-count bag of magical Rainbow Whirly Pops for your kids and their friends. They'll love the sweet taste, and you'll love seeing them enjoy a piece of candy that makes you nostalgic for your own childhood.

title: Rainbow Whirly Pops 5.25" - 36ct
desc: Suckers are always fun whether you are getting them for a child or an adult. There is just something to be said about Whirly Pops however. These giant suckers are 5.25 inches which means that it could take you quite a while to finish them off. You will also find that they are swirled with many different colors such as blue, red, orange, yellow, white, and green. This would make a fun gift for someone, and would also be a great party favor. These would even look great in a homemade arrangement because they are so large. Whatever you decide to do with them you are sure to be pleased and with a count of 36 of them there is sure to be plenty for everyone. These suckers are hard in texture but are sweet and sure to be able to please anyone who is lucky enough to get to take part in eating one.

title: Giant Whirly Pops 10ct - Rainbow
desc: Giant Whirly Pops are the sweet treat for the big kids! Why settle for a dinky little lolly when you can enjoy the enormous flavor of this big, bold hard candy creation! The Giant Whirly Pop includes a long length of tube shaped hard candy that is carefully wrapped to create a tight spiral disc. The entire length is covered in vibrant spiral colors, adding excitement to snack time! Our bulk lollipops are the perfect choice when stocking up for kids birthday parties, picnics and holiday events. Buy a package or two to keep at home to satisfy sweet cravings after school. One Giant Whirly Pop can last a very long time so you get tons of flavor out of each stick! Add a few together along with other stick candies to create a unique bouquet to give as a special gift. There is no resisting the sugary charms of this unstoppable giant lollipop!

Get ready for a carnival-themed bash with a box of these festive yellow pops. You can set them up on a colorful table of cotton candy and they'll fit right in. or you can keep them around the house to give your little ones when they need a dose of sunshine.

title: Green Whirly Pops - 24ct Displays
desc: Whether you need to match a color scheme or simply love the color green, our Whirly Pops will be a fast favorite! This classic lollipop features a look that's playful and nostalgic. Anytime candy lovers imagine an old time candy shop, the scene usually includes large spiral lollies on tall sticks gathered in a jar.Our green Whirly Pops offer a similar look with a tight coil of hard candy that's striped in deep green and pure white! Each Whirly Pop arrives individually wrapped in clear plastic so the twisted ribbons of color are visible. Add a handful to a jar for a decorative touch in the kitchen or hide in the pantry to give to the kids when they behave. It's easy to customize Whirly Pops for events.Just tie on a personalized gift tag with some ribbon and you have a fabulous birthday treat or an elegant shower or wedding favor! title: Brown Whirly Pops - 24ct Displays
desc: Who says candy has to be brightly colored to create an exciting visual display? These Brown Whirly Pops prove that earthy shades can be fun, too. Rich dark brown and snow white stripes swirl around in a pinwheel design.The lolli itself has a generous 3-inch diameter, so it will last a really long time. Hand out these Brown Whirly Pops at your child's next sleepover and they probably won't make a sound during the movie you rented for them.These suckers are pretty enough to make a candy bouquet out of for a wedding reception with a white or neutral color scheme. They can also be added to a jar by your business cash register for customers to take one with them when they leave.Now, as for flavor, you are probably thinking that they are chocolate, right? title: Tootsie Roll Jar - 96ct
desc: If you love classic candy, then Tootsie Rolls should be at the top of your snack list! This famous treat has pleased generations of candy lovers. The very first Tootsie Roll candy appeared in 1896.They were created to offer a unique texture that fell somewhere between taffy and caramel, without falling into either category. They wouldn't melt during the hot summer months, but were still soft enough to chew. Tootsie Rolls would become the very first penny candy that was individually wrapped!Now you can get all the Tootsie Rolls you want with our fun Tootsie Roll jar! This novelty candy gift includes a generous number of individually wrapped Tootsie Rolls.They arrive inside a decorative Tootsie Roll themed jar, with a clear window, dark brown sides and the famous white logo on the side. desc: Get your candy fix with our Tootsie Rolls midgees candy! Tootsie Roll is one of the oldest treats in the United States. This confection was invented in 1986 when Leo Hirshfield decided to open up a shop in New York City.Today, kids and adults love the chewy texture and chocolaty taste that makes these popular confections so irresistible. They're not quite taffy and not quite caramel but very smooth, making snack time even sweeter! Bulk Tootsie Rolls give you more pieces for snacking, parties and sharing.Every roll is individually wrapped in that familiar brown, red and white paper. That allows the candy to remain fresh and ready to enjoy. Take a handful with you as a quick treat on a busy day or use them as an easy after school snack for the kids. Tootsie Rolls also make great treat bag filler for birthday parties, picnics, holiday events and other gatherings.

title: Tootsie Fruit Rolls Fruit Chews - 5lb
desc: Let us get this straight. The classic Tootsie Roll chew that we love comes in a delicious fruity taste, too? We'll take it! Try these Fruit Tootsie Rolls and enjoy a whole new taste with this classic candy. Yellow is lemon, blue is vanilla, red is cherry, green is lime, and orange is...orange. Discover a whole new way to love this classic brand.Since 1896, Tootsie has been producing delectable candies that the world has grown to love. With 65 pieces per pound and a bulk bag of these, there's nothing tiny about the amount of delectable Tootsie Fruit Chews Rolls you'll get to enjoy!

title: Tootsie Roll Assorted Favorites - 3.5lb
desc: Do you love the element of surprise, or just have a hard time picking which candy you want to snack on? Fill a jar with these Tootsie Roll Assorted Favorites, close your eyes, and reach in for your surprise. This bulk supply contains a medley of delicious treats, including Tootsie Rolls, Dots, and Tootsie Pops.Every piece in this bulk supply of Tootsie Roll Assorted Favorites is individually wrapped. They are perfect for kids' parties or to hand out at Halloween. Tootsie Roll Industries was launched in 1896, making it one of the oldest candy companies. These are treats you likely grew up on. Snacking on them will make you feel like a kid again.Plus, these treats are peanut, tree nut, and gluten-free. Dots are even vegan-friendly, certified kosher, and fat-free.

title: Giant Tootsie Roll - 24ct
desc: Giant Tootsie Rolls are the best way to make sure you get enough of the candy you love! The classic Tootsie Roll is a confectionary mainstay here in the United States. It was first manufactured in 1896.What makes the Tootsie Roll stand out (aside from its delicious chocolate flavor) is its unique texture. It's chewy and soft like taffy with a stiffness and texture that's like caramel, yet doesn't quite fall into either category. The Tootsie Rolls you usually see often come in bite-sized portions that are individually wrapped.Our giant Tootsie Rolls offer the same amazing taste and texture, but in a much bigger size. Each piece measures a massive 10 inches! They still feature the familiar brown, red and white wrapper so you know you're getting a genuine Tootsie Roll candy. Giant Tootsie Rolls make great gifts, stocking stuffers, party favors or can be given out as Halloween candy!

title: Tootsie Roll Bars - 36ct
desc: Offering up the classic taffy-like chocolate treat, Tootsie Rolls, in a solid piece that makes a whole dessert or can be sliced for unconventional cake and cookie decorating, Tootsie Roll Bars are a king-size version of the tasty confection most people have enjoyed since they were tiny.In the classic chocolate-and-white wrapper, Tootsie Roll Bars are both satisfying and instantly nostalgic, providing the unique chocolate chews just like you have always had them! Bulk Tootsie Roll Bars can be assembled in a vase for a take-one-and-munch candy bouquet at a housewarming party, or they can be the foundation of a truly awesome take-home treat bag.This convenient wholesale box of Tootsie Roll Bars is a compact selection great for stowing in the pantry for easy desserts and sweet snacks. And remember, the whole point of Tootsie Rolls invention was to make a chocolate that did not melt – if you are entertaining in the summer, Tootsie Roll Bars are the treat for you!

title: Tootsie Roll Fruit Chew Pops - 48ct
desc: Tootsie Roll Fruit Chew lollipops are a must-try for anyone who loves the original roll candy. Each lolly starts with a disposable stick topped in a thick shell of delicious hard candy. Bite or lick away to expose the Tootsie Roll fruit chew filled center. Each lollipop includes two fun flavors. Taste orange and lime, strawberry and lemon, lemon-lime and orange, or blue raspberry and cherry.

title: Tootsie Roll Bunch Pop - 18ct
desc: Our Tootsie Roll Bunch Pops take your favorite lollipop and multiplies it many times! The classic Tootsie Pop was created in 1931 by Luke Weisgram. Luke was an employee of the Sweets Company of America at the time.That same company would later change its name to the world-renowned Tootsie Roll Industries. The first Tootsie Pops included a hard candy shell that surrounded a chewy center in one of many flavors.Today we still have many flavor options, which is why our Tootsie Roll Bunch Pops are so appealing. Instead of settling on just one, you can enjoy or give many! The Bunch Pop consists of many individually wrapped Tootsie Pops in assorted flavors.A larger clear wrapper keeps all the lollipops together so they are easy to give as a gift or keep as a snack while on the go. Our bulk Tootsie Roll Bunch Pops are convenient for events, parties, school activities and other special occasions!

title: Trick or Treat Candy Mix - 5lb
desc: Our Trick or Treat candy mix features a large assortment of classic confections in one big package. Each mix contains a blend of pumpkin bon bons, Nerds, Dots, Tootsie Pops, Starburst, Tootsie Rolls, Clark Bars, Smarties and other popular candies. Every piece is individually wrapped so it stays fresh.Save money on Halloween candy this year with our enormous Trick or Treat mix! This delightful collection of popular confections includes many childhood favorites. Whether you love something sweet, tart or chewy, you'll find it here. Simply pour into a big bowl and you're ready for Trick or Treaters! Our candy mix is also a quick and hassle-free way to fill up treat bags for kids.Make sure there's something for everyone at your next party by pouring our Trick or Treat candy mix in bowls or jars and serving on tables for guests. Teachers and schools can keep more money in their budget by ordering our bulk candy assortment for events and classroom parties!

title: Chocolate-Covered Tootsie Rolls - Theater Box - 12ct
desc: As if classic Tootsie Rolls weren't chocolatey enough, now there's Tootsie Roll Mini Chews! This unique confection takes a Tootsie Roll and covers it in a layer of smooth chocolate. Each bite is packed with cocoa-y goodness!It's like heaven in a roll for chocolate lovers. Our Tootsie Roll Mini Chews come in convenient theater boxes so they are easy to carry and share.Whether you're looking for an easy snack or want to put the finishing touches on your event menu, Tootsie Roll Mini Chews are a must-have.Our bulk Tootsie Roll pack gives you several theater boxes so you have plenty to hand out when serving a crowd. Open them up and pour into a candy dish or leave them in the box and take to work, school or wherever you might crave something sweet and chocolatey. Our Tootsie Roll theater boxes also make a fun addition to family movie nights!

title: Tootsie Roll Jar - 96ct
desc: If you love classic candy, then Tootsie Rolls should be at the top of your snack list! This famous treat has pleased generations of candy lovers. The very first Tootsie Roll candy appeared in 1896.They were created to offer a unique texture that fell somewhere between taffy and caramel, without falling into either category. They wouldn't melt during the hot summer months, but were still soft enough to chew. Tootsie Rolls would become the very first penny candy that was individually wrapped!Now you can get all the Tootsie Rolls you want with our fun Tootsie Roll jar! This novelty candy gift includes a generous number of individually wrapped Tootsie Rolls.They arrive inside a decorative Tootsie Roll themed jar, with a clear window, dark brown sides and the famous white logo on the side. Each piece is long and wiggly, made using soft, flexible red licorice that can be bent, folded, or stretched. Have a great time or use it to decorate cakes and more. Every inch offers sweet strawberry flavor with a delicious sugar granule coating.

title: Sour Strawberry Licorice Laces - 2lb
desc: Sour strawberry licorice laces combine one of the world’s favorite fruit flavors with a powerful burst of tang! This delicious confection includes a long rope of strawberry licorice in pink. Each piece is flexible and bendable, making it even more fun to eat! When you’re done braiding and knotting, simply place in your mouth and chew to discover the sweet fruit flavor and sour sugar granules that make this such an irresistible licorice.

title: Licorice Soft Drops Krepeliendjes - 2.2lb
desc: Krepeliendjes, or licorice drops, are a must-try for anyone who loves old fashioned candy. Each piece is flat on the bottom with a dome shaped top, just like a basic gumdrop. The sides are smooth with subtle texture in solid black. Take a bite or two to enjoy traditional black licorice flavor with a hint of sweetness. True licorice connoisseurs will love our soft krepeliendjes!

title: Sour Blue Raspberry Licorice Laces - 2lb
desc: Sour blue raspberry licorice laces are just as tasty as they are fun! Kids and adults alike will love tying, stretching, bending, and squishing these chewy candies. Each is long with a narrow size and round shape. Take a bite and enjoy blue raspberry with a generous dusting of sour sugar. It’s an exciting adventure for your taste buds in every bite! Our sour blue raspberry licorice laces are a must-have for kids parties and more.

title: Grape Licorice Laces Purple - 2lb
desc: Grape licorice laces are fun, tasty, and beautiful! Each piece is long and thin, forming a solid tube of tasty confection. They bend and stretch, making this a fun snack for kids who love to play with their food. Our bulk grape licorice laces pack contains a generous quantity of purple pieces that will go a long way when planning events, parties, or decorating cakes, cookies and more.

title: Rainbow CrEATables Licorice Laces - 2lb
desc: What’s better than sweet licorice you can eat? How about licorice that you can create with! CrEATable candy strings offer the taste and texture you love in a fun treat. Each piece is long and comes in an assortment of bold colors. Try yellow, red, blue, or green or have fun braiding, tying and building with your candy. This assortment includes rainbow licorice laces in green apple, strawberry, lemon, and blue raspberry.

title: Licorice Hooplas - 5lb
desc: Licorice Hooplas are a Spanish candy that gives you two taste treats in one! Each piece has a cute flower shape, with five petals and a center. The exterior offers one flavor while the dots within each petal contain another so you get two in every bite. Mini Hooplas are soft, chewy, and so sweet that your taste buds will beg for more! Open a bag and find out what all the hoopla is about with this flower shaped gummy candy.

title: Licorice Scotties Candy - 5lb
desc: Our customers are ''howling'' over how good these little pooches are! That's because these precious Licorice Scottie Dog Candies are an adorable and scrumptious treat that every dog lover can agree on. Know an animal and licorice lover? Have an animal rescue fundraising event? Or just want to have these adorable muts around the house for light snacking?These little doggies will have you wagging your tails and tongues about them! With about 62 pieces per pound, that's a lot of tasty pets to bring home! But we're sure you'll be okay with the company of these purebred candies with alpha sized taste.

title: Kenny's Licorice Laces Candy - 18lb
desc: Regular licorice is great, but if you actually like to have a little fun with your treats then Kenny's Licorice Laces Candy is for you. These yummy candy strands are as entertaining as they are delicious.Roll them into balls like yarn, create giant knots, or tie a bunch together for a jump rope. You can even make edible garland out of them.Aside from the fact that this tasty treat is fun to eat, Kenny's Licorice Laces Candy is sure to invoke a smile with its delightful flavor. Those who prefer fruit candy will not be able to get enough of the strawberry flavor.If you literally crave black licorice, then the 15-pound supply of black licorice candy laces should more than satisfy. We recommend getting both and combining them together. Kenny's Licorice Laces Candy is certified kosher, too.

title: Juicy Twists All Flavors - 12lb Kenny's

title: Original Red Vines Red Licorice Twists Jar - 160ct
desc: These delicious ropes are made of red licorice. You will find that these are soft but chewy at the same time. This is a texture that many people love to eat when it comes to candy. They come in a jar that contains 240 of them which means that you will have enough for many of your special occasions in which they might be used. This is one of the candies that are sure to be a hit with people of all ages. This is also not a candy that is messy which means it is great for smaller children. Licorice flavor has been loved for many years and for some this can even bring back pleasant childhood memories. You are sure to find that you will be happy with all aspects of this great candy if you are willing to give it a try.

title: Sour Punch Straws - 24ct
desc: There's a reason these Sour Cherry Punch Straws are molded into a rope-like form. It's to whip your tongue into submission with the amount of sour flavor and sugar they come packed with. title: Red Licorice Salt Water Taffy - 5lb
desc: Red Licorice Salt Water Taffy candies are a mix of chewy, red licorice and incredibly rich taffy. With a red and white swirl inside of a wax paper wrapper that's twisted at the ends, this Red Licorice Salt Water Taffy is also a beautiful candy that looks as good as it tastes.Do you know someone who is a classic candy lover? Want to surprise your kids with a fun, red-themed candy at your Fourth of July celebration? Have another red-themed event you need something yummy for? These Red Licorice Salt Water Taffy candies are ready to take your events to the next level with their scrumptious flavor and addicting chew.

title: Licorice Swirl Salt Water Taffy
desc: Prepare to hypnotize your taste buds with these Licorice Swirl Salt Water Taffies. In a stark contrast of black and white swirls, these candies are as yummy to eat as they are to look at. Use them for a thematic addition to Halloween or a formal wedding reception. Discovered in the late 1800s, salt water taffy was the product of an unfortunate event. When a candy store owner's shop was flooded with sea water, he decided to market his soaked taffys to the public! What a happy accident this incident turned out to be, because people have incorporated taffy into their summer snacks and memories for generations.

title: Licorice Caramel Cowhide Salt Water Taffy - 5lb
desc: ''Mooo-ve'' over for these Licorice Caramel Cowhide Salt Water Taffies. With their beautiful white and black cow spots and creamy flavor, you won't ever want to put these down or put them out to pasture. This snack is a classic that has satisfied candy lovers for years.Around since the late 1800s, the history is almost as sweet as the candy itself. When the tides turned and flooded a candy store owner's shop, he decided to market his salt water soaked taffys to the public! We're sure glad the sea found this taffy and so are the generations of people that have enjoyed it since.

title: Double Salt Licorice Tub - 6ct
desc: Gustaf’s traditional Dutch double salt licorice will take your taste buds on a journey back in time. Each morsel is thick and round, with smooth sides that are delightful on the tongue. title: Assorted Jelly Beans - 5lb
desc: Discover all your favorite flavors in our delicious jelly bean assortment! Before we had these irresistible beans, we had the Turkish delight. This confection was made of soft jelly that was smothered in confectioner's powder.By 1861, this unique snack would transform into the world's first jelly beans courtesy of a Boston candy maker William Schrafft. He even encouraged candy lovers to send jelly beans to Civil War soldiers as a show of support.Even though they were created way back in the 1800s, most historians believe that the jelly bean wasn't associated with the Easter holiday until the 1930s. Today, many families have adopted this sweet trend and made it a big part of their spring celebration.Jelly beans have even become a popular choice for other occasions, like birthday parties. Our bulk jelly bean assortment includes lemon (yellow), coconut (white), orange (orange), cherry (red), lime (green) and black licorice (black) flavors.

title: Licorice Wheels - 12ct
desc: Licorice wheels are a great way to enjoy this classic candy! Black licorice has been enjoyed throughout the generations. It's often associated with the pleasantries of childhood. Now you can relive those fond moments with every bite of our soft, chewy licorice wheel gummies! This treat brings that same irresistible taste in a fun string candy!Unlike solid gummies, our licorice wheels give you two ways to eat your favorite sweet snack. Every piece consists of a long string of black licorice that's wound tightly to produce a solid disc. Take a bite out of each round morsel or peel back the end and unwind the string. No matter how you choose to taste it, every licorice wheel will satisfy taste buds. With our convenient bulk candy pack, you won't have to worry when you're enticed into eating a second or third wheel! You'll always have plenty of licorice gummies to go around –even when guests arrive!

title: Kookaburra Cut Liquorice - Black & Red - 12oz. Tub
desc: Kookaburra cut licorice harkens back to simpler times when old fashioned candy was the best thing a kid could eat! These classic tidbits bring the flavors from that bygone era to the present so you can relive those fond childhood memories!Each tub of black and red licorice contains a generous quantity of individual pieces so you have plenty to enjoy at home or share. Set them out at parties, picnics and other gatherings to make the occasion even more memorable! Kookaburra cut licorice candy uses real licorice extract so you get a gourmet experience in every bite.As soon as you open the lid, you'll notice how aromatic these candies are. It's difficult to resist the rich taste which satisfies young and old alike! Savor old fashioned licorice taste in a product that's fresh, soft and so delicious! Keep a tub or two on hand so you always have a sweet snack ready to eat.

title: Jujy Fruits Candy - 7.5lb
desc: In Raspberry, Lemon, Lime, Orange, and Licorice, you can enjoy your favorite flavors of these Jujy Fruits Candies on their own or in a mixture of goodness. title: Crows - Theater Size - 12ct
desc: If you love licorice but prefer to skip the twists, Crows candy are a must-try. This gumdrop confection is a delicious alternative to licorice ropes. Each piece is full of traditional licorice flavor.Every bite includes a short, domed shape Ð just like a classic gumdrop! Unlike classic gumdrops, Crows candy are solid black. The smooth surface adds a hint of shine that makes these ebony treats so eye-catching.The original Crows licorice candy was created over 100 years ago in the 1890s. The Black Crows brand was trademarked in 1911. It was later acquired by the famous Tootsie Roll Industries. Our bulk Crows theater box pack gives you more of your favorite fat free candy! Every bite is so delicious and a better snack compared to fattier foods.Our bulk theater box candies are convenient for events, gatherings and holidays. There are no wrong ways to show your adoration of others with this fruity, sweet, red treat.

title: Cherry Cola Candy Sticks - 80ct
desc: Do these Cherry Cola Candy Sticks taste like the real thing? They sure do! Of course, since these sticks are hard candy they'll last a lot longer than a glass of soda. Cherry cola stick candy has swirls of red and brown stripes to represent the cherry and soda. They're also individually wrapped, so they're perfect to hand out at Halloween or place in a glass jar as a centerpiece on a table.Do you long for the days when you could pull up a chair in an old soda shop and watch intensely as the person behind the counter created magic with those gooseneck fountains? How did they get that super sweet cherry cola liquid to come out?The concept may not be a mystery to you anymore, but the delicious flavor of your favorite drink certainly has not lost its appeal. Now you can enjoy the taste of that special treat in our convenient Cherry Cola Candy Sticks.

title: Green Apple Candy Sticks - 80ct
desc: Green apple candy sticks have a classic striped look and an amazingly delicious and pucker-inducing flavor. While they look a little bit like candy canes, they have a totally different, refreshing taste. These green and white candy sticks look great in a candy jar when you're entertaining guests. You could even put them out for a St. Patrick's Day party. Each sour apple candy stick is individually wrapped, so they make great candies to put out at parties or in party favor bags.

title: Root Beer Candy Sticks - 80ct
desc: The flavor of root beer is a flavor that is loved by many. Most people remember the flavor of root beer from making root beer floats as a child. Well now you can get this great flavor in a candy stick. The sticks are fun and they are brown and white which makes them extremely appealing as well. Each stick is wrapped individually in order to help keep them fresh and seal in the flavor. You will also find that these are hard candies so if you love a hard candy and the root beer flavor then this is right up your alley way. You can even stick one of these in your float to really make it fun and exciting. You get 8 sticks and this manes that you will have plenty to enjoy. The size of the sticks is 5 inches in length so there is plenty of candy and flavor in each stick.

title: Peppermint Candy Sticks - 80ct
desc: It's a candy cane without the curve. Peppermint sticks are a refreshing treat that has been around for years. Old fashioned stick candy was first created in the 1830s. It quickly became a favorite snack for adults and children. By the 1860s, most candy shops and carnivals featured this item because it sold so well. Today we still savor the convenient shape and rich taste of hard candy sticks, especially when they come in a classic flavor like peppermint! Our bulk hard candy is easy to serve and share. Each piece is wrapped in clear plastic. Place them upright in a clear jar or cup at home or as part of the food selection at parties. You can also tuck a few inside treat bags or wedding favors to give your guests something sweet to remember the occasion by. Our peppermint candy sticks feature a pure white background with solid and pinstripes that twist in an alternating pattern from top to bottom.

title: Doscher's Famous French Chew Taffy Bars - 24ct
desc: Oh mon cheri, please say "oui, oui!" to taking Doscher's Famous French Chew Taffy Bars home with you! With their world-class chew and sophisticated flavor, these taffy bars will whisk you away on a flavor-driven escape to Paris.Every time you bite into one of these French Chew bars, you'll be able to close your eyes, hear the romantic accordion music echoing throughout Paris's famous arrondissements, smell the freshly baked croissants and picture the Eifel tower standing in all of its glory. So what are you waiting for? Order these Famous French Chew Taffy Bars from Doscher's and take your European getaway today!

title: Bonomo Turkish Taffy Banana - 24ct
desc: Banana Turkish Taffy is a deliciously fruity snack with a unique texture. The original Bonomo Taffy was created by Albert J. Bonomo's son Victor. Albert came to America from Turkey.Once here, he founded the Bonomo Company located in Coney Island. The company produced delicious confections including hard candy and salt water taffy.Victor had a different idea and decided to combine the best of both treats into one product. His Turkish taffy recipe included egg whites and corn syrup prepared in a batter then baked. What makes Turkish taffy original is the texture. Each bar is hard and can be shattered yet retains the chewiness that everyone loves.Our bulk Bonomo Turkish taffy box includes many full size bars in banana. Each is individually packaged with a wrapper bearing the classic Bonomo taffy logo and text. It's a nostalgic candy that's a great choice for holidays, parties and gatherings!

title: Bonomo Turkish Taffy Vanilla - 24ct
desc: Ladies and gentlemen, this is one divine candy that you won't want to miss. Vanilla Turkish Taffy is a genius blend of chewy, stretchy taffy and warm vanilla flavor. A simple and understated match that makes a big impact once you take a bite.In a big box, these are idea candies to buy for sporting event snack bars, to keep in your kitchen cabinet if you have frequent visitors or a family with a strong sweet tooth or just if you want to try something new! We promise that you can't go wrong with these Vanilla Bonomo Turkish Taffies because they're just that good.Serve them with dessert or coffee for a lovely complement. Even give them away as party favors. Whatever you do, definitely order yourself some Vanilla Turkish Taffy from Bonomo today.

title: Bonomo Turkish Taffy Strawberry - 24ct
desc: Bonomo Turkish taffy is available in sweet strawberry! Many people remember Bonomo taffy from their childhood. That's because this uniquely hard confection has been around for a long time! The original was created by Victor Bonomo.Victor's father Albert emigrated from Turkey and founded a candy company under the same name. While his products focused on hard candy and salt water taffy, Victor decided to create something in-between.His original recipe included corn syrup and egg whites that were prepared then baked to produce that unique texture that makes Turkish taffy so unique. Each bar is hard enough to shatter yet still retains its chewy texture.Our strawberry Bonomo Turkish taffy offers sweet, ripe flavor in every bite! Our bulk taffy box include many full size bars that are individually packaged in nostalgic Bonomo wrappers. Tear open one end and enjoy fresh Turkish taffy anytime you're craving something fruity and chewy!

title: Bonomo Turkish Taffy Chocolate - 24ct
desc: Step back in time when you take a bite of Bonomo Turkish taffy! Classic taffy is usually soft and smooth. Turkish taffy is different because it is chewy, but includes a hard crunch.The original confection was created by Victor Bonomo, son of Turkish immigrant Albert J. Bonomo who founded the Coney Island-based Bonomo Company. Turkish taffy is technically a nougat that's made using egg whites and corn syrup that's baked to crunchy perfection.Our bulk Bonomo Turkish taffy box contains many full size bars that are individually wrapped and ready to give or enjoy! This version features a rich chocolate flavor that makes every bite even more delightful. Adults will love receiving chocolate Turkish taffy as a nostalgic stocking stuffer during the holidays!

title: Almond Roca - 12ct Box
desc: Rich, delicious and timeless, Almond Roca is a longstanding confection that's full of savory flavor. This exquisite candy is crafted using delectable hard toffee with almond butter crunch and a sweet chocolate coating.The combination was created by the founders of the Brown & Haley Company in 1912. A local librarian tried the hard confection and used the Spanish word for rock (Roca) to describe it. The name fit and now we have the Almond Roca that candy lovers enjoy today!Our bulk Almond Roca is a great choice for important events and gatherings. You get larger quantities that can fill many party or wedding favors. Place them in bowls or on platters to serve guests at special celebrations.You can even make this gourmet candy part of your holiday festivities. Everyone will enjoy the sophisticated combination of toffee, chocolate and almonds packed into every bite of Almond Roca!

title: Almond Roca Packs - 48ct
desc: When something tastes this good, we think there has to be a catch. But with Almond Roca Packs, there isn't. They're just that good! With a savory butter crunch center coated with the rich flavor of premium chocolate and topped with delicious fresh almonds, these candies will melt in your mouth and make you drool. Make a tea party even sweeter with a platter of these to munch on, add some to a dessert table display for a unique treat, or put a few in a gift basket for a gourmet surprise. With 48 pieces in every display box, there's enough to go around for every occasion!

title: Almond Roca Sugar Free Hanging Bags - 12ct
desc: Almond Roca is a delicious hard toffee candy that is rich in flavor and texture. Similar to English toffee, this version includes almond butter crunch and a luxurious coating of coarsely ground almonds.It's a treat for the taste buds that is sure to satisfy even the most intense candy cravings. What's even better is that this version of Brown & Haley Company's famous confection is completely sugar free! Now you can stick to a healthier diet and still get your hard toffee fix!Each piece is oh-so-tasty and includes all your favorite ingredients minus the unnecessary sugar. Our bulk Almond Roca toffee includes several individual hanging bags so you can easily divide them up for gift giving, holidays or to hide wherever you may need them!Place a bag in your car, in the pantry and in your desk at work so you always have the irresistible taste of sugar free Almond Roca butter crunch toffee close by!

title: Cashew Roca 8oz Tin
desc: If you love the rich taste of classic Almond Roca, then you simply must try Cashew Roca! This unique variation offers a similar blend of ingredients with a different nut.The original features almond butter crunch and hard toffee covered in sweet chocolate then rolled in delectable ground almonds. This version presents the same amazing treat but replaces almonds with savory cashews!Cashew Roca is the perfect candy for any occasion. Save it at home as a snack or offer to guests who stop by. Cashew Roca packs contain several individual tins that are convenient for gift giving.Use them as tasty stocking stuffer at Christmas, add them to Easter baskets or include them as part of a gift basket for friends, family or coworkers! The distinctive look and luxurious taste is at home in any social situation. Impress your recipient (and keep a few tins for yourself) by ordering a bulk Cashew Roca toffee candy!

title: Almond Roca 8oz Tin
desc: Buttercrunch toffee with almonds. We're salivating just reading this description and we're sure you will too as soon as you take a nibble of Almond Roca. Due to the sophisticated flavor combination of this candy, these delectable bites look right at home on a dessert table or served alongside coffee and tea.Wake up to a happier morning by enjoying one of these with your first cup of joe. title: Bonomo Turkish Taffy Banana - 24ct
desc: Banana Turkish Taffy is a deliciously fruity snack with a unique texture. The original Bonomo Taffy was created by Albert J. Bonomo's son Victor. Albert came to America from Turkey.Once here, he founded the Bonomo Company located in Coney Island. The company produced delicious confections including hard candy and salt water taffy.Victor had a different idea and decided to combine the best of both treats into one product. His Turkish taffy recipe included egg whites and corn syrup prepared in a batter then baked. What makes Turkish taffy original is the texture. Each bar is hard and can be shattered yet retains the chewiness that everyone loves.Our bulk Bonomo Turkish taffy box includes many full size bars in banana. Each is individually packaged with a wrapper bearing the classic Bonomo taffy logo and text. It's a nostalgic candy that's a great choice for holidays, parties and gatherings!

What originally began as regular taffy was transformed after David Bradley's candy shop was unexpectedly flooded during a storm in 1883.The concept behind salt water taffy was born out of a humorous response Mr. Bradley gave to a child who asked for a piece of taffy after the storm. Today candy lovers enjoy salt water taffy in a diverse selection of unique flavors, ranging from fruity to chocolaty to savory.This version features a delectable dessert in every round bite. The foil wrappers are not just clever and thematic, but also easy to remove, making chocolate basketballs a perfect candy-dish sweet.

title: Gold Nugget Choco Rocks - 5lb Bulk
desc: Gold nugget choco rocks are one of the most fascinating and unique candies available! This treat is unlike any other chocolate snack. Every piece features an original shape that looks much like natural rocks.The surface is covered in a luxurious gold shell that produces an alluring shimmer that looks very realistic, right down to the fine gravelly texture that runs along all sides. While these chocolate nuggets look like rocks, they taste amazing! Don't worry, you won't break any teeth when you bite down on each rich piece. The candy coating on the outside provides a crunch while smooth, irresistible chocolate hides within Ð just waiting to take your taste buds on a sweet adventure!Our bulk gold nugget choco rocks are perfect for many occasions. Use them to fill a pot of gold at your next St. Patrick's Day party. Choco rocks are also great for decorating baked goods and edible decor!

title: Chocolate Golf Balls - 5lb
desc: Now golfers can enjoy their favorite confection and their favorite sport at the same time! Our chocolate golf balls are packed with rich flavor that comes in a fun themed package.Each bite-sized morsel consists of a solid orb of delectable chocolate. The smooth, dark surface is covered in a thin foil wrapper with a uniquely printed exterior. The pure white background is covered in realistic pock marks to recreate the look of an actual golf ball!You can take these delicious chocolate with you anywhere, from the green to the clubhouse! Our bulk chocolate balls are also a great treat for special occasions like golf themed birthday parties, picnics and holidays.Impress a fellow golfer with the smooth taste of fine chocolate that comes in a package they can appreciate! Our bulk chocolate golf balls makes it easy to order enough for wedding favors, treat bags and edible gifts.

title: Sour Power Belts - 150ct Wrapped
desc: With 150 Sour Power Belts in this big bulk supply you will have plenty of opportunity for flavorful fun. These candies were introduced in 1985, and folks of all ages have not been able to get enough of them.If you love pucker-inducing treats, these Sour Power Belts should definitely be on your shopping list. This box of delicious treats is available in Green Apple, Blue Raspberry, Strawberry, and Watermelon. We recommend getting all four before you drive yourself crazy trying to pick only one.The belts are about 9-inches long and just under 1-inch wide, so they are pretty much the perfect size. Big enough to satisfy, but not so big you get a tummy ache. Since these Sour Power Belts are individually wrapped you can surprise your kids with them in their lunch box and hand them out at Halloween.

title: Tiffany Blue Foil Chocolate Balls - 10lb
desc: Do you have expensive taste but a budget to stick to? Well, these Tiffany Blue Foil Chocolate Balls might be the perfect candy for you! With the famous, powder blue of the high end jewelry store, Tiffany, and decadent chocolate underneath, you'll add a sophistication to every sweet snack break. Bring these to a bridal shower, bachelorette party, or the baby shower for a boy! They even make a great addition to a blue themed candy buffet bar or a wedding reception. These glamorous chocolates come in a bulk bag and will impress your taste buds and guests whenever you serve them.

title: Chocolate-Covered Oreo Cookies - 5lb
desc: This may be the one time when we encourage people to judge a confection by its cover. Because this cookie's cover is a thick layer of creamy, melty chocolate! Chocolate Covered Oreos have become a sensation in recent years, and with this bulk bulk bag, there are over 70 cookies to enjoy. Whether you're an Oreo fan who insists on eating the cream first and then the cookie or vice versa, we think you'll all agree that savoring the chocolate cookie coating before it all is the best way to go about this particular batch. It's a problem we don't think you'll take issue with while you make your way through mouthwatering layer upon layer of chocolatey, creamy goodness.

title: White Yogurt Mini Twist Pretzels - 10lb
desc: Our white yogurt mini twist pretzels give you a new way to enjoy your favorite baked treat! Pretzels are delicious on their own, with their crunchy texture and salty taste. This version takes miniature knots and smothers them in cool, smooth white yogurt. It’s an irresistible combination that will please taste buds and calm cravings! Bulk white yogurt pretzels give you more pieces for snacking, sharing, and parties.

title: Chocolate Soccer Balls - 5lb
desc: Wrapped in foil that looks like a classic black and white soccer ball and with amazing chocolate balls beneath, these Chocolate Soccer Balls are winners for sure! Do you have a friend or family member who plays soccer? Why not make their next game extra special by bringing an order of these Chocolate Soccer Balls by at half time? There are plenty to share with the whole team and can cheer up a losing team or help celebrate an incredible win!Chocolate Soccer Balls also are a great candy for sports-themed birthday parties or soccer training camps. Score big with your friends and family and order some today. Oleee, ole, ole, ole. Get ready to chant the most famous soccer game song of all time with these Chocolate Soccer Balls!

title: Chocolate Rocks - 5lb
desc: Rocks aren't very appetizing, unless they are chocolate rocks! These natural looking candies are absolutely gorgeous to see and so sweet to the taste buds.If you love cocoa flavor, then you will fall in love with these charming little edible pebbles. Each includes a dense chocolate candy that's covered in a solid candy coating in a rainbow of earthy colors!What makes chocolate rocks so delicious isn't just their taste, but also their appearance. Each stone looks just like the real thing! The candy coating creates lovely texture while each chocolate is uniquely shaped Ð just like real rocks. This assortment includes a variety of hues, ranging from slate blue to burnt orange and black.Grab a handful or enjoy one at a time. No matter which color you choose, each offers the same amazing chocolate taste. Our bulk chocolate rocks are a must-have for cake decorating and special occasions!

title: Assorted Sports Chocolate Balls - 5lb
desc: Golf balls, tennis balls, basketballs, baseballs, soccer balls and footballs, oh my! We're sure everyone will want to be on your team when you bring these Assorted Sports Chocolate Balls in bulk supply to your next party or sporting event.That's because these sports balls aren't only melty milk chocolate and scrumptious, but they're also fun to play with! Hit a home run with one of these baseballs and throw it into your mouth. Kick a field goal through your friend's fingers and then indulge in chocolate. You're going to score big points with whoever you share these Assorted Sports Chocolate balls with, that's for sure!

title: Milk Chocolate Gold Coins - 10lb Medium Size
desc: This 5-pound supply of Milk Chocolate Gold Coins is perfect to hand out at nearly any event. Fill a treasure chest with them for a pirate-themed birthday party.Use them as a snack at your next poker party, include them in a gift bag, or hand them out at Halloween. These Milk Chocolate Gold Coins are about the size of a quarter, and the highly detailed gold foil makes them look like real currency. There are hundreds of coins in this bulk supply, which should be more than enough for any celebration.Although great for a party, you don't need to be planning a special event to order these Milk Chocolate Gold Coins. Stock your candy jar with them and you'll always have a quick bite size snack handy when you need to satisfy a little sugar craving. These medium size yummy chocolate coins are certified kosher, making them an ideal Hanukkah gift, too.

title: Bright Pink Foil Chocolate Balls - 10lb
desc: Bright pink foil chocolate balls are delightful to look at and pleasing to the taste buds. These simple candies offer big visual appeal. Each piece includes a luxuriously solid orb of milk chocolate with a smooth exterior.The surface is covered in a delicate blanket of foil with a glorious pink shine. It's both tasty snack and elegant display that works at home, the office or at events!Pour our bright pink foil chocolate balls into any glass container and you have a beautiful chocolate display!That's why our colorful foil wrapped candies are such a great choice for wedding favors, showers and other high class celebrations. We make it easy to get large quantities for a big crowd with our affordable bulk chocolate balls pack. Order just one package of chocolate balls or multiple so you have plenty to go around whether you're hosting an event for 10, 100 or 1,000!

title: Red Foil Chocolate Balls - 10lb
desc: Wrapped in shiny, metallic red wrappers, these little Red Foil Chocolate Balls are sure to make your eyes pop as your mouth waters for what's inside. Inside is a solid ball of melty milk chocolate. It's up to you whether you want to chomp, chew or let this little sphere melt away. Red Foil Chocolate Balls are the perfect color and candy for Christmas, the Fourth of July, and a birthday party for someone who adores the color. Stock up on these Red Foil Chocolate Balls and mix and match with other flavors and colors or enjoy them all by themselves. Whatever you do, you'll love unwrapping these chocolate balls one after the other.

title: Large Pink Striped Ball Lollipops - 100ct
desc: Quite possibly the pretties treat available on CandyStore.com, these Large Pink Striped Ball Lollipops are sure to invoke a lot of smiles. What's the first thing that comes to mind, when you look at these lollies? A beach ball, right? This makes them perfect for beach-themed parties and weddings. They will cause shrieks of excitement from little ones and they can bring out the inner child in anyone.These Large Pink Striped Ball Lollipops are 1 inch in diameter, so they last a really long time. Creamy white balls get swirled in bright pink stripes for a look anyone will be charmed by. These suckers are not just pretty though. Their delicious strawberry flavor will have you reaching into the candy jar a little more often.Decorate a birthday cake with these or make bouquets of them for centerpieces by stabbing the sticks in green floral foam. They are perfect for baby showers, kids' parties, and Valentine's Day.

title: Bonomo Turkish Taffy Strawberry - 24ct
desc: Bonomo Turkish taffy is available in sweet strawberry! Many people remember Bonomo taffy from their childhood. That's because this uniquely hard confection has been around for a long time! The original was created by Victor Bonomo.Victor's father Albert emigrated from Turkey and founded a candy company under the same name. While his products focused on hard candy and salt water taffy, Victor decided to create something in-between.His original recipe included corn syrup and egg whites that were prepared then baked to produce that unique texture that makes Turkish taffy so unique. Each bar is hard enough to shatter yet still retains its chewy texture.Our strawberry Bonomo Turkish taffy offers sweet, ripe flavor in every bite! Our bulk taffy box include many full size bars that are individually packaged in nostalgic Bonomo wrappers. Tear open one end and enjoy fresh Turkish taffy anytime you're craving something fruity and chewy!

title: S'Mores Taffy - 3lb
desc: There's nothing as delicious as a homemade s'more that's made over a roaring campfire. Our s'mores taffy brings that nostalgic taste to your candy collection!Each piece is round, smooth and oh-so-chewy. Every mouthful combines fluffy marshmallow, graham cracker and milk chocolate flavors into one irresistible confection! You can identify the flavors included just by looking at the 3 layered pattern, which includes dark brown, creamy white and rich toasted brown hues.Our bulk taffy comes individually wrapped so it remains fresh and tasty. The clear wrapper allows the unique pattern to show through so you can admire your candy before you eat it! Order for special occasions like picnics, camping trips, birthdays or save for important events like showers and weddings.Serve them in candy dishes or use them to fill party favors to give your guests something sweet to savor after the celebration! Our bulk s'mores taffy is a one-of-a-kind confection that's sure to please!

title: B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops - 100ct
desc: An assortment of Chocolate, Banana, Strawberry, and Molasses-Peanut, these B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops have a flavor that everyone in your family will love. B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops should be on deck for the next great candy you're going to try.Get ready for little league, soft ball, or a big kid baseball game with an order of these B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops. Your little sluggers will be able to snack on these while they wait to take the plate and give them a boost they need to hit it out of the park! Order some B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops for opening day, a backyard BBQ, or any other sports-themed event that needs some extra fun.

title: M&M's Milk Chocolate Theater Boxes - 12ct
desc: Lights, camera, M&Ms;! These movie theater classics will help you bring a taste of the big screen home. In theater size boxes, cuddle up on the couch and make every movie night more chocolatey and memorable than ever, box after box. You'll feel like a movie star with every luscious morsel. Since 1941, M&Ms; have been gracing the shelves of movie theaters and candy shops, alike. Their appealing, button-sized shape, hard candy crunch, and milk chocolate meltiness have made them an all-American favorite. So pop some popcorn, put on your favorite movie, and see why these ''melt in your mouth, not in your hand'' classics have made their way in Hollywood.

title: Black Unicorn Pops - 24ct
desc: Black unicorn pops are the unique treat that everyone loves to eat! These eye-catching candies are like a classic lolly except much bigger and bolder. Each pop includes a length of smooth hard candy lollipop attached to a sturdy stick.The shapely sides create a spiral look from top to bottom. To make black unicorn pops even more exciting, a set of black lines wrap around the outside, creating a pattern that's similar to candy canes but even better in deep ebony! Now you can get black unicorn pops in bulk!Order a package so you always have something sweet to enjoy at home. They also make great stocking stuffers and party favors. Grab a handful and display in a glass vase to share at showers and weddings or any time guests arrive. Everyone will love the juicy mixed berry flavor and convenient lollipop stick! Combine our 8" lollipops with other black and white candies for a matching presentation that really stands out.

title: Pufflettes Green Apple Gummy Bites - 5lb
desc: Cute alert! These adorable little Pufflettes Green Apple Gummy Bites are so gosh darn cute that we can barely contain ourselves! Bright green and pristine white, these delicious gummy candies are coated in so many sugar crystals that they sparkle in the sunlight. And with a kick of green apple flavor, these little green apple Pufflettes will fill your mouth with a texture and flavor combination that will blow your mind!Do yourself a favor and bring home some of these green apple gummy bites today to enjoy a mini mouthful of deliciousness. If you need some ideas how to enjoy them, try using some for a gingerbread house to introduce an unexpected flavor to the Christmas season. Or add a few Pufflettes to the top of cocktails for a delicious and beautiful surprise.

title: Large Gummy Bananas - 5lb
desc: Why don't bananas snore? Because they'd wake up the bunch! We're pretty big fans of these large Gummy Bananas candies over here at CandyStore.com and are positive that you will be too once you take a bite.Make your next beach themed party or outing a real hit with an order of these yellow goodies. Put a few of these gummy bananas on top of a pina colada and you'll have a beautiful garnish that tastes good too! Or just keep them around the house to feed to your little monkeys when they deserve a tasty treat.

Choose from, black licorice, cherry licorice, blue raspberry, chocolate, grape, green apple, peach, pineapple, peach, pina colada, red raspberry, root beer, spicy cinnamon, strawberry red, or watermelon! They make a delicious snack for kids, can be used as straws in cold drinks and make a perfect addition to any party of candy bar buffet. These ropes will tie your taste buds up in knots, but we're sure it's a tangle you and your mouth won't mind!

title: Chocolate Baseballs - 5lb
desc: Batter up! You're on deck to try these Foil-Wrapped Chocolate Baseballs. When you bring these candies home, you'll hit a home run with your family and friends because these candies are fun and delicious!If you have a little leaguer or someone who plays ball, order some of these awesome baseballs to reward them after 9 long innings. Or throw a curve ball into your typical candy dish stock by filling them up with these sluggers. All you'll need is the peanuts and cracker jack when you bring these adorable, fun and delicious Foil-Wrapped Chocolate Baseballs home today.

title: Assorted Sports Chocolate Balls - 5lb
desc: Golf balls, tennis balls, basketballs, baseballs, soccer balls and footballs, oh my! We're sure everyone will want to be on your team when you bring these Assorted Sports Chocolate Balls in bulk supply to your next party or sporting event.That's because these sports balls aren't only melty milk chocolate and scrumptious, but they're also fun to play with! Hit a home run with one of these baseballs and throw it into your mouth. Kick a field goal through your friend's fingers and then indulge in chocolate. You're going to score big points with whoever you share these Assorted Sports Chocolate balls with, that's for sure!

title: Orange Salt Water Taffy - 5lb
desc: Delectable orange juice flavor, individual waxed paper wrappers, and the unforgettable texture of a boardwalk treat make Orange Salt Water Taffy an awesome choice for your next event. This salt water taffy is colored a creamy, dreamy orange to add sweet sunshine to your color scheme, and its flavor is delicately tangy without straying into the sour.A great addition to an assortment of fruit-flavored sweets, this nostalgic candy choice speaks of the seaside! Orange salt water taffy has been enjoyed for a century at seaside resorts and retreats, and it keeps that old-time association for generations of taffy fans!This single-color wholesale taffy for filling jars or treat bags has all the happy traits of that timeless sweet, like the distinctive soft texture that high-quality traditional taffy provides and the lasting flavor that suffuses every bit of the candy.

title: Caramel Apple Taffy - 3lb
desc: Remember going to the autumn festivals and buying a delicious caramel covered apple? Now you can enjoy that same flavor experience anytime you want with our delicious caramel apple taffy!This savory snack is both fruity and sweet so you get both flavors in every bite. Each piece includes a rich, creamy brown outer ring that surrounds a generous dollop of light green at the center – just like the skin on a ripe Granny Smith apple!Our bulk caramel apple taffy gives you many pieces for events, holidays and more. Enjoy caramel apples with the mess by snacking on these charming taffies instead! Pour them into a bowl and offer visitors or take them to work as a special seasonal treat for coworkers.These apple candies never over ripen and come individually wrapped so they stay fresh and enjoyable! Include them in your fall celebrations or add them to elegant bags or boxes to use as shower or wedding favors.

title: B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops - 100ct
desc: An assortment of Chocolate, Banana, Strawberry, and Molasses-Peanut, these B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops have a flavor that everyone in your family will love. B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops should be on deck for the next great candy you're going to try.Get ready for little league, soft ball, or a big kid baseball game with an order of these B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops. Your little sluggers will be able to snack on these while they wait to take the plate and give them a boost they need to hit it out of the park! Order some B-B-Bats Taffy Lollipops for opening day, a backyard BBQ, or any other sports-themed event that needs some extra fun.

title: Dubble Bubble Big Slugger Baseball Bats Candy - 12ct
desc: Sporty packaging makes Dubble Bubble Bubblegum the perfect choice for team pizza parties and birthdays at the batting cages! Dubble Bubble Big Slugger Baseball Bats bring together candy with sports in a way that will delight kids and amuse adults.Pieces of classic Dubble Bubble chewing gum fill each plastic bat in this quantity of novelty candy containers, and each package includes a baseball keychain Ð so Big Slugger Baseball Bats are a candy favor, a toy, and a souvenir all rolled into one! Great for commemorating a first trip to the ball game or for adding a cheeky backdrop to a groom's cake, Big Slugger Baseball Bats from Dubble Bubble are always popular with young sports fans.Better yet, the heap of colorful gumballs inside each bat offer a big enough portion to be saved or shared. Candy and toys are the perfect pairing, and with their baseball theme, Big Sluggers are the perfect choice for bringing novelty bubblegum to your event!

title: Dubble Bubble Pro-Ball Candy - 12ct
desc: Dubble Bubble Pro Ball candy is the sports themed treat for fans, players and chewing gum lovers! This delicious treat comes in a fun package that's sure to excite anyone who loves a good game.Our bulk Dubble Bubble Po Ball box includes an assortment that showcases soccer balls, footballs, basketballs and baseballs. Take your candy game to the next level with a chewy treat that lasts!Each Pro-Ball includes a large container in one of your favorite ball shapes. Each include realistic detail and the classic Dubble Bubble logo emblazoned on the front. Inside hides a number of tasty little orbs. Each gumball comes in a vibrant color.Tasted bright red, blue, green or yellow while admiring your unique ball-shaped container! To sweeten the deal, Dubble Bubble also includes a matching keychain in every package! The keychain includes a similar ball shape with silver ring so you have another reason to enjoy your favorite bubblegum.

title: Gumball Baseball Bats - 24ct
desc: Sports fans will absolutely love our gumball baseball bats! This amazing candy is a tasty treat, unique gumball holder and a fun sports-themed toy.Children will step up to the plate to earn one of these novelty baseball bats! Each includes a black handle attached to a clear bat shaped container. The inside is filled with colorful gumballs. Open the end and grab a gumball or two, then save the rest for later!Gumball baseball bats are a must-have for sports gifts and events. Use them as unique prizes at school activities and community events or impress a child you know who loves baseball with this delicious gift. They're great for gift baskets but can also be used as stocking stuffers during the holidays.If you're hosting a baseball themed birthday party, these gumball filled bats make great game prizes or party favors! Share your love of the game and gumballs with this all American gumball baseball bat!

Our bulk sports lollipops also make a unique favor for birthday parties and team banquets.

You can shout all of these famous sports sayings when you open one of our incredible Chocolate Sports Balls Tubs.
